entry.name: ok

argument.name: message
argument.desc: A short description of the assertion

entry.desc: A boolean assertion, equivalent to JUnit/CommonJS assertTrue. Passes if the first argument is truthy.

longdesc.p: The most basic assertion in QUnit, ok() requires just one argument. If the argument evaluates to true, the assertion passes; otherwise, it fails. If a second message argument is provided, it will be displayed in place of the result.
